Game: Reversal Challenge E for Everyone The classic game of Reversal is re-imagined for the Nintendo DS. Calculate and place the perfect orbs to entrap your opponent. Surround them from all sides and angles to take victory. To confuse your opponents, use newly invented items and attacks that can blast, shift and shuffle the enemy's orbs. <1>http://images.launchbox-app.com/1b6e52d9-efe7-4074-8a50-50f3f6cb496d.png</1> http://images.launchbox-app.com/d162ed0b-184b-44f5-86e2-28e6f1631a21.jpg http://images.launchbox-app.com/49f93904-2c93-4216-86a1-bfaf9b67e4ee.png http://images.launchbox-app.com/e3632ab2-cb95-4b70-8498-2db81d94d64f.png
